module.name: connection_of_individual_product
module.keywords: application, module, connection, individual, product, process plant

purpose.P: The Connection of individual product application module supports the requirement to record a connection relationship between individual products.
A connection between products indicates that matter, energy, mechanical load or information can be transferred between them.

example.P: Pump P_1001 is an individual product. Pipe FW_1001 is an individual product.
The relationship between pump P_1001 and pipe FW_1001, that indicates one is connected to the other, is a connection_of_individual_product.
The connection between individual pump P_1001 and individual pipe FW_1001 can be classified as a 'pump suction pipe connection'.

LI.P: a relationship between one individual product and another that indicates one is connected to the other.

note.P: Class of connection of product is within the scope of the Class of connection of product application module.

LI.P: classification of a connection relationship between products;
individual products that make a connection;

note.P: Individual products that make a connection are within the scope of the Involvement of individual product in connection application module.

uof.name: Connection_of_individual_product
uof.description: The Connection_of_individual_product UoF identifies a connection of individual product relationship and defines the individual products that are connected.
